title: Fallen Angel
description: "Fallen Angel (a Mafia Romance) is like the Godfather meets "Insert Sexiest Book/Movie you've watched or read". As far as HOT ASS Alpha Male's go - damn, Robert Stone could give any sexy, billionaire hero a run for their money. AND Brooke Stiles, I love her. She is strong, and I most certainly love a confident fearless leading lady." - Amazon Reviewer   On the first day of her holiday, Brooke Stiles meets the dark-eyed and dangerous Robert Stone.  Stone has never had a normal relationship for fear of his past being exposed. Not knowing how to love or respect, he struggles with his overwhelming feelings for a woman who makes him question everything he believes in.  This is a story about an extraordinary woman who meets a remarkable man and has to discover if she is strong enough to take on his life.  Fallen Angel, Part 1 is a  Mafia Romance  and intended for readers over the age of 18. Contains graphic scenes of a sexual nature. This series is complete.
